info.name: Ipernity Dark style 2017
info.description: 2017 updated style to turn ipernity.com web site to light texts on dark background. Style made by Seppo Välimäki and uploaded by ipernity members association (ima).
info.additionalInfo: Unlike previous versions by Seppo Välimäki, this style sheet only changes the colors and not the layout (album aligning, page width, column width).
